attributes.title: Violation of Principles.
attributes.review: As a voter in the upcoming election, I was curious to see how many of Trumpâ€™s policies line up to his media portrayals. Unfortunately, in reading the privacy policy upon download, I found an immediate violation of principles. This app, much like the Cambridge Analytica team, has the ability to collect your information OUTSIDE OF THIS APP (worse than the offense of TikTok) and use it for Trumpâ€™s campaign. This is a violation of every userâ€™s privacy and online property which little to no notice. Not only that, but all it serves to do is crash my like-brand-new device and ask for money. What a sham. If this candidate, who is against handouts, is going to continue to ask for free handouts, then the nail is in the coffin on my vote. Little to no useful information and an overall joke. I would give this -5/5 if I could.
